name: Voxel Tower Defense
description:
Protect your core from invading entities, stack up your resources and construct powerful turrets, or create structures that unlock more useful recipes and power up surrounding Towers!

If all else fails? Transform the enviroment to your desire, remove bordering blocks to make more room for Towers or completly tear away the field and create new routes for the entities to follow.

Find your own command style and survive for as long as you can!

Additional Controls: 

Q/E : Rotate Camera

T: Toggle Time Speed
